meta.title: Digitlas - Custom Websites & AI Agents
meta.description: Digitlas: Custom website creation and automation solutions with AI agents to boost your business. Performance, SEO, and modern design.

home.heading: The key to your digital presence.

services.heading: Our Services
services.subheading: Tailor-made solutions to boost your business.

cards.title: Static & Showcase Websites
cards.description: Creation of ultra-fast, secure, and SEO-optimized websites to ensure an impeccable online presence.

cards.title: Custom AI Agents
cards.description: Development of automation solutions and intelligent conversational agents to optimize your processes and customer relations.

cards.title: Digital Strategy & SEO
cards.description: Analysis and optimization of your online visibility to attract more customers and stand out from the competition.

projects.title: Developer Portfolio
projects.alt: Portfolio application for a Python developer, showcasing a biography, certifications, and technical skills.

projects.title: AI HTML Builder
projects.alt: AI HTML Builder application that generates HTML and Tailwind code from an image, showing a mockup and the corresponding code side-by-side.

projects.title: ModelProductFusion
projects.alt: ModelProductFusion application that transforms a simple product photo into a studio-quality render with professional lighting.

projects.title: Image Styler
projects.alt: Image Styler application demonstrating a before-and-after transformation. The image is a realistic man's portrait, split in two to compare the original photo with its re-stylized version, which is also realistic, in an artistic drawing or manga style.

contact.heading: A project? An idea?
contact.description: Our team is available to discuss your digital project. Let's schedule a meeting to bring your ambitions to life and connect you with our partner developers.
